author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Does Adam have any workshop infrastructure plans for 2026, and does he have any advice on self-motivation? Does Adam make Christmas presents for his family, and what's his preferred holiday movie? In this live stream excerpt Adam answers these questions from Tested members neitring, home chicken and jordon freeman, whom we thank for their support! What's your favorite holiday film? 

00:00 Shop infrastructure plans
04:34 Self motivation
08:58 Making Christmas presents
10:10 Christmas movies
Sortimos are coming back in 2026 for the LAST TIME! Sign up for notifications; it's your last chance for this model. https://adamsavage.com/products/savage-industries-sortimo-t-boxx

title: Adam's 2026 Workshop Organization Plans
